heroSection.title: Take Control of Your Finances
heroSection.description: Track your income, expenses, and financial goals in one place.

functionalities.title: Key Features
functionalities.subtitle: Discover how Cash Flow empowers you to take full control of your finances with a clean and intuitive interface.
functionalities.incomeDescription: Monitor all your income streams with ease — whether it’s your salary, freelance payments, or passive income. Stay on top of your cash flow with detailed overviews and visual insights.
functionalities.expensesDescription: Log your daily spending, categorize expenses, and analyze where your money goes. Gain a clear picture of your financial habits and identify areas for saving.
functionalities.goalsDescription: Define your financial targets and track your progress in real time. Whether you’re saving for a vacation, emergency fund, or investment — stay focused and motivated.

questions.q: How does Cash Flow help manage my finances?
questions.a: Cash Flow allows you to track your income, expenses, and budget in one place, helping you make informed financial decisions.

questions.q: Can I export my financial data?
questions.a: Absolutely! You can download your financial records in CSV format for external use.
